name: Fatal Fate
description:
Apocalypse has come! Humanity had it's time, and your task is to get rid of it! Play the role or Fatal Fate in desperate run for human survival! Don't let them live! Kill'em all!

- Collect traps and place them on the tracks!

- Combine effects for ultimate combos!

- Enjoy the gory destruction you cause!

::CREDITS::

Marcin Janus - Code/Design

Mariusz Szulc -Graphics/Design
